if(specialite!="A-Total"){

df_spe_tot_region<- df |> filter_df(list(age2 = age_ref,type_hosp=NA,niveau = "Total Spéclialité régional",lib_spe_uma= specialite, niveau =c("Spéclialité - Categ")))  |> distinct(annee,tot)

dplyr::full_join(df_spe_categ,df_spe_tot_region) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(pm = nb*100/tot) |>

  distinct(categ) |> dplyr::pull(categ) -> sel_categ

groups <- c(ghu_ref,sel_categ)

}

}




df |> dplyr::mutate(categ = ifelse(! is.na(ghu),ghu,categ),annee =factor(annee)) |>

  dplyr::distinct(annee,categ,ghu,tot) |> dplyr::rename(nb = tot) |> 
  dplyr::mutate(categ = ifelse(categ==ghu_ref,"APHP " %+% ghu_ref,categ)) ->df_BARPLOT

df_BARPLOT |> dplyr::select(annee,categ,nb) |> dplyr::filter(categ =="APHP " %+% ghu_ref) |> dplyr::mutate(categ = "APHP") |> dplyr::rename(nb_diff = nb) -> df_diff

df_BARPLOT <- df_BARPLOT |> dplyr::left_join(df_diff) |> dplyr::mutate(nb_diff = ifelse(is.na(nb_diff),0,nb_diff),nb= nb-nb_diff) |> dplyr::select(-nb_diff)
df_BARPLOT_limites <- df_BARPLOT  |>  dplyr::reframe(tot = sum(nb), .by=annee)


if(specialite == "A-Total"){
  
  criteres = list(niveau ="Total régional",age2 = age_ref,lib_spe_uma = specialite,type_hosp=NA)

}

  dplyr::select(annee,tot) 

df_BARPLOT <- df_BARPLOT |>
  dplyr::mutate(categ = ifelse(categ=="APHP","APHP Autres GHU",categ))

groups_bar_plot = c("CLCC","Cliniques","ESPIC","CH","APHP Autres GHU","APHP " %+% ghu_ref)

colors_define <- c('#FFFF33','#E41A1C','darkgreen', '#984EA3','#377EB8' ,'#a4c7e4')

df_BARPLOT <- df_BARPLOT |>
  dplyr::mutate(categ = factor(categ,levels = groups_bar_plot)) |>

       fl = paste(ifelse(f < 0.015, '', paste0(sprintf("%g", round(f, 3)*100), '%\n', prettyNum(nb, big.mark = " ")))))

get_bar_plot(d_groupe = df_BARPLOT,d_groupe_tot = df_BARPLOT_tot,d_groupe_limites = df_BARPLOT_limites,colors_define)
